title: Missing Teen Found
body:
UPDATE March 28, 2018: Mr. Feresu has been safely located. Davison FeresuThe Prince George’s County Police
Department is seeking the public’s help in searching for a missing teen. He is
identified as 16-year-old Davison Feresu.Feresu was last seen in the 7500
block of Belgravia Lane in Landover on March 23rd at
approximately 7:30 am.Feresu is described as a black
male, 5’4”, and 160 pounds.  He was last seen wearing a white polo shirt
and khaki pants.Anyone with information on his
whereabouts is asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s
Regional Investigation Division – Central Region at (301) 772-4911.
Posted by


Prince George's County Police
